data.title: Chapters and Councils
data.meta_description: These are the chapters and councils that govern the Greek system at IUP.
data.text:
Interfraternity Council

The Interfraternity Council (IFC) governs organizations that are either affiliated with the North-American Interfraternity Conference or are independent social fraternities.

Current IFC Fraternities

Acacia Fraternity

Kappa Delta Rho Fraternity

Kappa Sigma Fraternity

Phi Delta Theta Fraternity

Phi Kappa Tau Fraternity

Phi Sigma Kappa Fraternity

Sigma Chi Fraternity

Sigma Pi Fraternity

Theta Chi Fraternity

Visit these chapters and the Interfraternity Council on Crimson Connect.

Unrecognized IFC Fraternities

Phi Kappa Psi Fraternity lost university recognition in May 2020.

Pi Lambda Phi Fraternity lost university recognition in February 2019.

United Greek Council

The United Greek Council (UGC) governs organizations that are affiliated with the Multicultural Greek Council and National Pan-Hellenic Council. This umbrella council is for historically multicultural/multiethnic and African American fraternities and sororities.

Current UGC Sororities and Fraternities

Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc.

Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, Inc.

Chi Upsilon Sigma Sorority, Inc.

Lambda Sigma Upsilon Fraternity, Inc.

Mu Sigma Upsilon Sorority, Inc.

Omega Psi Phi Fraternity, Inc.

Sigma Gamma Rho Sorority, Inc.

Visit these chapters on Crimson Connect.

Panhellenic Association

The Panhellenic Association (PHA) governs organizations that are affiliated with the National Panhellenic Conference.

Current PHA Sororities

Alpha Gamma Delta Sorority

Alpha Sigma Alpha Sorority

Alpha Sigma Tau Sorority

Alpha Xi Delta Sorority

Delta Gamma Sorority

Delta Phi Epsilon Sorority

Delta Zeta Sorority

Sigma Kappa Sorority

Sigma Sigma Sigma Sorority

Theta Phi Alpha Sorority

Zeta Tau Alpha Sorority
